sections.heading: 3224 through 3237 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the Oklahoma Discovery Code
sections.text: The Oklahoma Discovery Code shall govern the procedure for discovery in all suits of a civil nature in all courts in this state.Added by Laws 1982, c. 198, ยง 1. Amended by Laws 1989, c. 129, ยง 1, eff. Nov
